body: The amount given is the typical daily wage for mercenary warriors, masons, craftsmen, cooks, scribes, teamsters, and other trained hirelings. This value represents a minimum wage; many such hirelings require significantly higher pay.
name: Hireling, Trained
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Equipment/Goods And Services/Spellcasting and Services/Hireling/Trained
